title: Regulation (EEC) No 2039/73 of the Commission of 27 July 1973 amending Regulation (EEC) Nos 565/68 and 2261/69 in respect of the non-fixing of additional amounts for slaughtered ducks imported from Poland and Romania
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 2039/73 OF THE COMMISSION  of 27 July 1973  amending Regulations (EEC) Nos 565/68 and 2261/69 in respect of the non-fixing of additional amounts for slaughtered ducks imported from Poland and Romania
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 July 1973.
For the Commission
The President
Franรงois-Xavier ORTOLI
